patchNotes.title: Talent Changes

general.developerCommentary: I removed any <vanilla, abilities, basic, 2> cooldown reduction from the build to not make funnel builds but i still think that could affect this style of gameplay that some players want to have by just go spamming it and having fun by becoming THE BEYBLADE.

patchNotes.developerCommentary: I wanted to increase Sonya possible skill Ceiling and make more standalone talents that could suit the Barbarian highlander concept..i also like strong woman

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 1, 1> renamed to <modified, talents, 1, 1>

texts.text: Every 10 <modified, abilities, trait, 0> generated Sonya receives 1% attack speed up to 50% for 5 seconds. The effect refresh with new stacks

changes.developerCommentary: I don't really know how to balance that attack speed received to <modified, abilities, trait, 0> generated but the idea is to make Sonya receives Attack Speed by generating <modified, abilities, trait, 0> so by staying in combat she gets stronger.

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 7, 2>

texts.text: Instead of healing 10% of her maximum health instead will heal 60% of the damage received in the last second.

changes.developerCommentary: I wanted to make this active more about how you use it instead of how you spam it.

changes.name: NEW: <modified, talents, 13, 2>

texts.text: If Sonya receives 350 damage in a single <modified, abilities, basic, 2> her next <modified, abilities, basic, 1> will stun the primary target by 0.75 seconds and secondary targets for 0.25 seconds.

changes.developerCommentary: This is a mix of two ideas i had that i found both cool and wanted a talent that could mix on between builds BUT i don't really know the numbers to balance this one.

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 13, 1> renamed to <modified, talents, 13, 1>

texts.text: For 0.75 seconds after using <modified, abilities, basic, 2> Sonya reduces all incoming damage by 50% also cleanse Slow and Roots.

changes.developerCommentary: I want to bring Ignore Pain on some way that is eazy to use but can be used on any build and also useful enough

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 13, 0>

texts.text: Increase the cooldown reduction from 5 to 8 seconds
The cooldown will be decreased if you don't hit enemy heroes instead
Additional functionality: Increase Spear Range by 50%

changes.developerCommentary: I always liked Mystical Spear and want to bring MORE to it making it make Sonya play differently from normal..by making it also hit non-heroic units you could also use it to move better on fights and also better to make camps to maintain high <modified, abilities, trait, 0>. With extra Range makes it eazier to missplay and hit a non-heroic unit.

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 16, 2>

texts.text: Additional functionality: This shield is increased to 60% if used while below 15% maximum health.

changes.developerCommentary: I want to increase the thematic of Barbarians fight near death.

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 16, 1> renamed to <modified, talents, 16, 1>

texts.text: Sonya basic attacks cleave and cause enemies to bleed for 40 damage over 4 seconds. While bleeding enemy heroes have 25% reduced healing.
subtexts: The cleave will work the same as Malthael and Leoric

changes.developerCommentary: I wanted to mix Cleave with Rend that for me are classic skills for Barbarians

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 20, 1>

texts.text: Changed functionality: If Sonya takes a fatal hit while <modified, abilities, heroic, 1> is active she becomes unkillable for 3 seconds. During that time allied heroes cannot target Sonya
subtexts: If this is activated and you ult again while under it's effect the cooldown will be reset, so it's possible to stack that 2 times
Allied heroes can't interact with her but she can interact with them or vehicles

changes.developerCommentary: It's supposed to be a low cooldown and not a super revive. I also didn't want to make it with Leap so it's harder to escape and i also want to make it harder for Sonya to abuse it by not letting allied heroes help her.

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 20, 2> renamed to <modified, talents, 20, 2>

texts.text: Changed functionality: <modified, abilities, basic, 2> will deal extra damage based on your attack speed. Enemy champions hit by <modified, abilities, basic, 2> will have their Physical armor reduced by 10 up to 40 for 4 seconds
subtexts: For every 1% will increase total <modified, abilities, basic, 2> damage by 1% by making Sonya spin faster similar to how Garen on league of legends work
The debuff will be refreshed with every hit

changes.developerCommentary: The concept is based on the idea of spinning faster, i like Garen, Juggernaught, Axe..I like spinning and faster spinning equals fun.

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 20, 3> renamed to <modified, talents, 20, 3>

texts.text: Reactivate <modified, abilities, basic, 0> within 3 seconds from hitting the enemy hero to pull him back to Sonya.
subtexts: Enemy hero will move at the same speed of Sonya <modified, abilities, basic, 0>
Enemy hero will be pulled at the closest position to Sonya

changes.developerCommentary: Sonya is the perfect hero for that and no one can tell me otherwise. COME OVER HERE. Also this is useful against high mobility and is ok for a storm talent tier..
